comments:
I20050329-2000-gtk

- invoke code complete at the caret (|) in this CU:

package m6testing;

import java.util.*;

public class StarGeneric {
	void foo(List<?> star) {
		star.|
	}
}

I get the exception below. This is because Util does not deal with multiply
nested types (see bug 85293).
